llm.feedback:
Up | 0–3 weeks | Tighten near-term triggers to concrete dates (EU auto-relief timetable; India Aug 27 tariff trigger; Aug 28 de minimis expiry) | Watch EU legislative progress, confirm Aug 27 tariff action and Aug 28 de minimis outcomes, and drop hedged equity-stake speculation | 70% (DGG6HXUFZ)(VCZKKPORO)
Down | 0–3 weeks | If EU relief slips or India timing pushes out, pass-through risks re-emerge and margins compress | Watch EU relief delays, India tariff timing, and de minimis expiry outcomes | 55% (DGG6HXUFZ)(VCZKKPORO)
Up | 3–6 months | Elevate 90-day tariff truce extension as primary hinge; align with policy-uncertainty contours | Watch extension status, renewal terms, and tariff-rate changes shaping import volumes and retailer dynamics | 60% (RHXDOHQQX)
Down | 3–6 months | Lapse or renewal on harsher terms reintroducing 30%/10% tariffs and re-pricing cross-border flows | Watch extension lapse, renewal terms, and resulting shifts in import volumes and pricing | 40% (RHXDOHQQX)
